mapper.sql: PK_ID, EQUIPMENT_CODE, CHAMBER_TYPE, EQUIPMENT_NAME, FACTORY_NUM, EQUIPMENT_VERSION, MANUFACTURER, MANUFACTURER_DATE, EQUIPMENT_IP, EQUIPMENT_MAC, STATUS, UNIT_CODE, DELETE_FLAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME
mapper.select:
select count(1) from leden_equipment e
and e.EQUIPMENT_CODE = #{equipmentCode}
mapper.insert: insert into LEDEN_EQUIPMENT (PK_ID, EQUIPMENT_CODE, CHAMBER_TYPE, EQUIPMENT_NAME, FACTORY_NUM, EQUIPMENT_VERSION, MANUFACTURER, MANUFACTURER_DATE, EQUIPMENT_IP, EQUIPMENT_MAC, STATUS, UNIT_CODE, DELETE_FLAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME ) values (leden_collect_equipment_seq.nextval, #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chamberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacturerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{equipmentIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

PK_ID,
EQUIPMENT_CODE,

mapper.update:
update LEDEN_EQUIPMENT
EQUIPMENT_CODE = #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHAMBER_TYPE = #{chamberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_NUM = #{factoryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENT_VERSION = #{equipmentVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANUFACTURER = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANUFACTURER_DATE = #{manufacturerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EQUIPMENT_IP = #{equipmentIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENT_MAC = #{equipmentMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_CODE = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_EQUIPMENT set EQUIPMENT_CODE = #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHAMBER_TYPE = #{chamberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACTORY_NUM = #{factoryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_VERSION = #{equipmentVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANUFACTURER = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANUFACTURER_DATE = #{manufacturerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EQUIPMENT_IP = #{equipmentIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_MAC = #{equipmentMac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_CODE = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select E.*,U.UNIT_Name as unitName from ( SELECT
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rowno,LEDEN_EQUIPMENT.*
FROM LEDEN_EQUIPMENT
where ROWNUM <= #{end}) ledenEquipment
WHERE ledenEquipment.rowno >= #{start} ) E,SYS_UNIT U where E.UNIT_CODE=U.UNIT_CODE
and CHAMBER_TYPE=#{chamberType}
and CREATE_DATETIME between to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select EQUIPMENT_MAC from leden_equipment where unit_code=#{_parameter}
